segments.text: I am still fixated on the woman in the foreground.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so calmly drying that plate, completely absorbed in her chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, without a hint of concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is planted firmly in what is now a considerable puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't felt the water seeping into her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me surprised by her incredible lack of perception.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet continues to run, adding more water to the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must be completely zoned out, lost in her thoughts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is oblivious not only to the flood but also to the children behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she's in her own little world, disconnected from reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of distraction is almost admirable in its intensity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and tell her to look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is steadily expanding across the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her peace is about to be very rudely interrupted by a wet surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what her reaction will be when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR
